## Welcome to my website!

I was worried you might have gotten lost on the way...

Hi, I’m Matteo!

I’m a graduate student dedicated to building data science skills to solve complex environmental challenges. With a focus on ecology, conservation, and restoration, I aim to drive meaningful insights and advance solutions in environmental data science.

Now that you’re here, feel free to look around and get to know me better!

If you’d like to connect or see what I’ve been working on, don’t hesitate to drop me an email or check out my GitHub!
